name: sm.html
tagline: Display a text as large as possible on your screen with browser.
body:
### Welcome to sm.html.
This is Web editon, so we can use it with browser (Firefox, Chrome ...).

### use
check the links and key in something.

```
$ firefox http://chusiang.github.com/sm/sm.html
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
